---  直到为Success修饰节点， 一直执行节点，直到返回结果为 Success。
local NodeDecoratorUntil = require_path("NodeDecoratorUntil","battle/behaviourTree/Nodes/Composite/Decorator/NodeDecoratorUntil")
---@class NodeDecoratorUntilSuccess : NodeDecoratorUntil
local NodeDecoratorUntilSuccess = SimpleClassUtil:class(NodeDecoratorUntil)

function NodeDecoratorUntilSuccess:initialize()
    self.super:initialize(Enum_BT.Node_Type.Decorator_Until_Fail)
    self:setDesiredResult(Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success)
end

return NodeDecoratorUntilSuccess
